about_the_game:
Lyra Convolution is a free UE5 game that showcases the latest and greatest features of Unreal Engine 5. It's a must-play for any gamer who wants to experience the next generation of gaming.

Lyra features two exciting game modes:

Elimination Mode: A team deathmatch mode where you'll battle it out against other players in a sprawling open world.

Control point mode: A mode where you'll need to work together with your team to capture and hold key points on the map.

No matter which game mode you choose, you'll be able to enjoy Lyra's stunning visuals, fluid gameplay, and immersive audio.

Features:

Unique and styled maps:

Dive into the captivating world of Lyra, where a diverse array of meticulously crafted maps awaits your exploration. Each map is thoughtfully designed to cater to every player's unique style and preference, offering a rich and immersive gaming experience tailored just for you.

Game currency - Lunars:

Earn Lunars in Lyra by eliminating enemies, winning games, and more. Use these tokens to unlock characters and customize your gaming journey.

Lyra characters:

Define your in-game identity with Lyra's cosmetic characters. From sleek outfits to expressive styles, personalize your presence on the battlefield and showcase your unique gaming flair.

Cross-play support:

Lyra Mobile supports cross-play between mobile and PC devices. This means that you can play with your friends no matter what platform they're on.

Performance scalability:

Lyra, powered by Unreal Engine 5, offers seamless performance scalability on desktop and mobile devices. Experience stunning graphics with Nanite system optimization on desktop, and enjoy optimized performance on the go.

Free to play: Lyra is completely free to play.

Download Lyra Convolution today and experience the future of gaming!
